downloadTitle: MVP Session 16: Build and Apply Reports from Shape Data in Visio 2010 (working files)
downloadDescription: Practice extracting and presenting shape data as reports in Microsoft Visio 2010 with these diagrams, part of the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions, Video 16.
detailsSection: Practice extracting and presenting shape data as reports in Visio 2010 with these diagrams, created as companions to the Visio 2010 MVP Sessions (http://visio.microsoft.com/MVPSessions), Video 16. MVP Sessions Video 16 covers how Shape Reports, a Visio 2010 feature, allow you to create reports about shapes within a diagram, as well as data associated with those shapes, and view that information in various formats. Use these working files to follow along with the video and practice creating dynamic reports with a few clicks, customizing existing reports, and displaying them on the diagram to simplify complexity.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the diagrams to your computer and then open them with Visio 2010.
additionalInformationSection: Watch the Build and Apply Reports from Shape Data video (http://visio.microsoft.com/en-us/Get_Started/How_To/Pages/Session-16-Build-and-apply-reports-from-shape-data.aspx).
